save_hotel: If you don’t have accommodation yet, you can book at the Barceló Hotel with a guest discount!
save_hotel2: Book at Barceló Hotel with a discount
dress_code_intro: We kindly ask our guests to follow traditional Sevillian etiquette for a daytime church wedding. Here are some simple guidelines to help you choose your outfit:
dresscode_h3_lady_1: Short or midi dress. Ankle-length dresses are allowed as long as they are appropriate for a daytime wedding
dresscode_h3_lady_2: Soft fabrics such as silk, crepe, lace or linen are ideal, as well as floral prints and soft or vibrant colors
dresscode_h3_gentlemen_3: Tie or bow tie required, even if colorful or fun-patterned.
dresscode_h3_gentlemen_5: Very bright colors or flashy patterns
dresscode_h3_gentlemen_6: Sneakers, casual loafers, or casual clothing
form_description: There is some information we would need to know to organize every detail. Please kindly respond to the survey before February 10th
form_guests_label: How many children will be coming with you? (Please specify the age in additional information section)
form_couple: Will you be coming with couple? (If yes, please specify the name in the additional comments.)
wedding_ceremony_desc: Where we’ll say ‘I do’ surrounded by family, friends, and love.
intro_rata:
Your presence truly means the world to us on such a special day.

If you’d like to give us a gift, we would really appreciate it in cash, if possible.

But if it's easier for you, feel free to send a transfer to the account below:
music_survey_desc: If you have any questions, please contact us at the following phone numbers:
